data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
These modules are a framework for writing classical (pre-WWII)
    ciphers in a consistent manner. Note that these modules are meant
    for learning and fun only; not as serious ciphers. Initially
    implemented are Caesar, Polybius, Trithemius, Reverse, and RailFence
    ciphers.
